channel.title: MP: option to disable auto weapon switch
channel.description: Can you add an option to disable the behavior to automatically switch to a new weapon that I picked up in multiplayer? For example when I switch between shotgun and MP5 and I pick up a rocket launcher in the middle of a fight, that totally distracts me.

item.title: MP: option to disable auto weapon switch
item.dc:creator: fury
item.description:
Not a bug, but that’s something that doesn’t even exist in vanilla HL1DM (HL1: Adrenaline Gamer feature)… I hope this will get added.
